attributes.action: Increase both Incapacity Benefit and Income Support - especially those who deserve it!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those who truly feel that they are poorly supported by the Government need to show that they are "in need".
This is the only way anyone will probably listen. I've posted and sent enough letters, and nothing has happened.
Please sign and show that you agree....
